string.eng: CRC was unable to access the registry, which is needed to preserve settings.\nPlease try running the application As Administrator.
string.rus: CRC не смог получить доступ к реестру, который необходим для сохранения настроек.\nПопробуйте запустить приложение с правами администратора.

string.eng: Could not connect to the IRC server; CRC will now shut down.\nTry running As Administrator or allowing CRC in your firewall.
string.rus: Не удалось подключиться к IRC-серверу; CRC теперь будет закрыт.\nПопробуйте запустить с правами администратора или выставить CRC в исключения в брандмауэре.

string.eng: You are now connected to the network
CRC was unable to read or write files needed to communicate with the game.\nYou may continue using the built-in client for now.\nPlease try running the program As Administrator.
string.rus: CRC не смог прочитать или записать файлы, необходимые для общения с игрой.\nНа данный момент Вы можете продолжать использовать встроенный клиент.\nПопробуйте запустить программу с правами администратора.

string.eng: Script version out of date; please exit the game and install the latest CRC gamedata.
string.rus: Версия скрипта устарела; Выйдите из игры и установите последнюю версию.

string.eng: CRC must be restarted for language changes to take full effect.
string.rus: Перезапустите CRC, чтобы изменения языка вступили в силу.

string.eng: Nicks must be at least 1 character long.
Nicks must be at most 30 characters long.
Nicks may only contain letters, numbers, and these characters: _-\^{}|
Nicks may not begin with a number or -
Internet connection failed; CRC will now shut down.\nTry running As Administrator or allowing CRC in your firewall settings.
A mandatory update for CRC is available. Please check the external client to download it.
This update requires reinstallation of gamedata after downloading.

A mandatory update for CRC has been released.\nAfter downloading, extract the entire folder; do not merge with the old version.\nClick Download to be taken to the download page, or Close if you prefer to go there manually.
Press the desired key now to change your in-game chat button.\n\nModifiers such as Alt, Ctrl, or Shift are not supported.
Sorry, that key is not supported by STALKER.
Welcome to Chernobyl Relay Chat\nPlease pick your preferred language below\nYou can change it from the Options menu later
